item.title: Environmental “Efficiency” in The New Trump Administration
item.description: The new Trump administration will realize that regardless of whether we are in Red or Blue states, we all need a clean and healthy planet.

item.title: Toyota Exec Warns Proposed Trump Policies Could Hurt Industry, Consumers
item.description: A top Toyota exec warns tariffs and EV policies proposed by President-elect Donald Trump could harm consumers and the industry.
